All Classes

  • All Classes Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    Base64SerializationUtility  
    Beetle
    Implements the logic of the Beetle: a piece that can get on top of other pieces to block them.
    CommunicationProtocol
    Creates a specific server communication protocol for each client that connects to a server, that is, how the server interprets and responds to client requests.
    DummyPiece
    Implements the logic of the DummyPiece: a piece that only serves as a placeholder that simulates other pieces.
    EventJComponent
    Extension of a JComponent capable of handling action and change listeners, storing them and executing them in cumulative action and change events.
    EventJPanel
    Extension of a JPanel capable of handling action and change listeners, storing them and executing them in cumulative action and change events.
    GameField
    Canvas component which shows the actual place where the pieces are being placed and the game is being played.
    Grasshopper
    Implements the logic of the Grasshopper: a piece that can jump over other pieces.
    HexField
    A generic canvas like component made for displaying and moving around the hexagonal pieces of a hive game.
    Hive
    Modelization of the hive (a compostiton of all the pieces in the game and their relations).
    HiveMain
    The starting point of the program, a controller that coordinates the model and the view in a whole, functioning app.
    HiveMain.ServerStatus  
    ImageEventJPanel
    Extension of a JPanel capable of handling action and change listeners, storing them and executing them in cumulative action and change events, that has a background image which can be loaded from a resources directory.
    NetworkClient
    Creates a client capable of connecting and communicating with a specified server.
    NetworkServer
    Creates a server capable of accepting and managing incoming connections from clients.
    Piece
    Modelization of a game piece's common characteristics, this is an abstract class, each piece type will need further implementation of its specific behavior in other designated classes.
    Piece.PieceColor
    Each piece can be of two possible colors.
    Piece.Placement
    Describes the possible positioning of a piece on a particular side of another piece.
    Piece.Side
    This enum works as a mean to represent the six sides of a piece (hexagonal) by the relative direction in which they face.
    PnlCredits
    This component provides a credits UI.
    PnlHostGame
    This component provides a host game UI.
    PnlJoinGame
    This component provides a join game UI.
    PnlMainMenu
    This component provides a main menu UI.
    PnlOfflineGame
    This component provides a offline game UI.
    PnlOnlineGame
    This component provides a online game UI.
    PnlSettings
    This component provides a settings UI.
    QueenBee
    Implements the logic of the QueenBee: the slowest but most important piece, to be protected form the oppontent's attack.
    SmartScroller
    The SmartScroller will attempt to keep the viewport positioned based on the users interaction with the scrollbar.
    SoldierAnt
    Implements the logic of the SoldierAnt: the quickest and farthest moving piece.
    Spider
    Implements the logic of the Spider: it inherits from the SoldierAnt because it has a similar movement logic.
    ToBePlacedField
    Canvas component which shows a player's pieces that are yet to be placed in the hive.
    XMLElement
    Represents a single XML element as a java object.
    XMLObject
    Represents a XML file.
    XMLParser
    Manages an XML file's reading and writing, contains methods for parsing information from an XML file to a XMLObject and vice versa.
